title: Animals of the Arctic
creator_credit: Karl Maslowski, Stephen Maslowski and Centron Films
brief_description: This film introduces students to the wide variety of wildlife that roams the plains and seashores of the Arctic. It shows how the animals and birds have adapted to their environment. Photography: Karl and Stephen Maslowski. Suitable for upper primary, lower and middle secondary levels.
